src:
Stephen Curry má za sebou operáciu zlomeniny, líder Warriors vynechá približne tri mesiace
02 Nov 2019, 11:35 by Webnoviny
2.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Dlhoročný líder klubu zámorskej basketbalovej NBA Golden State Warriors Stephen Curry má za sebou operáciu zlomeniny ľavej ruky, ktorú utrpel počas tretej štvrtiny stredajšieho zápasu s Phoenixom (110:121). Lekári odhadujú, že 31-ročný Curry vynechá približne tri mesiace, do súťažného diania teda zasiahne najskôr vo februári 2020.
Dvojnásobného držiteľa ceny pre najužitočnejšieho hráča súťaže operovali v Los Angeles. Zranenie si Curry privodil pri páde na ruku, keď sa snažil brániť protihráča. Aron Baynes z tímu Suns však tiež nešťastne spadol a skončil na Curryho ruke.
Tímu Golden State Warriors sa v tejto sezóne zatiaľ veľmi nedarí, z piatich duelov dosiahli iba jeden triumf a po boku so Sacramentom Kings, New Orleans Pelicans a Oklahoma City Thunder sú na chvoste tabuľky Západnej konferencie.

text:
Stephen Curry has undergone fracture surgery, Warriors leader misses about three months
02 Nov 2019, 11:35 by Webnoviny
2.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) - Longtime leader of the NBA basketball club Golden State Warriors Stephen Curry has undergone a left-handed fracture surgery that he suffered during the third quarter of Wednesday's match with Phoenix (110: 121). Doctors estimate that 31-year-old Curry misses about three months, so he will intervene in the competition at the earliest in February 2020.
The double prize winner for the most useful player competition operated in Los Angeles. Curry inflicted damage on his hand as he tried to defend his opponent. However, Suns Aron Baynes also fell unhappily and ended up on Curry's hand.
The Golden State Warriors team is still not doing well this season, with only one triumph out of five duels, along with the Sacramento Kings, the New Orleans Pelicans and the Oklahoma City Thunder at the tail of the Western Conference table.
Stephen Curry has a fracture operation, leader Warriors misses about three months © SITA All rights reserved.
